title: Mint Royale Font
content:
[http://991.com/newGallery/Mint-Royale-Singin-In-The-Rai-397560.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720142354/http:/991.com/newGallery/Mint-Royale-Singin-In-The-Rai-397560.jpg "http://991.com/newGallery/Mint-Royale-Singin-In-The-Rai-397560.jpg")

What is the font that is used in "Mint Royale" ?

Thanks so much!
author: vanillabean

comments.content:
Freehand 521
